snippet.title: Bootstrap Island Teaser - Virtual Reality Roguelike Survival Game
snippet.description:
Step into the buckled shoes of a 17th century explorer, as you get shipwrecked on a tropical island. Bootstrap Island is an intense roguelike survival VR game, where you must adapt to survive against overwhelming odds on a mystical island.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1942110/Bootstrap_Island/

#bootstrapisland #survival #virtualreality 

Discord: https://discord.gg/x48uSXbUyv
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/islandvr
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9iCbqFZyWd5L0POH1fDoAg
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BootstrapIsland/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BootstrapIsland
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bootstrapisland/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bootstrapisland
